attributes.action: Disarmament of Dangerous [Non-Nuclear] Military Weapons from the Superpowers
attributes.additional_details: Dangerous [non-nuclear] military weapons are being disproportionately deployed everyday in other countries, resulting in the criminal acts of killing and injuring innocent civilians. There is not enough regulation on the countries using them. I am not indifferent to this violence and want the British Government to take a stand on the issue!
